title: wine_Duckhorn_2005_Three_Palms_Vineyard_Merlot_(Napa_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 36496.
country: US.
description: Duckhorn's Three Palms bottling is one of the oldest and most consistent Merlot vineyard designations in California and this is a classic example. The wine always is very tannic. But the '05 is dry and rich and complex in mineral-laden cherries and currants, with just the right application of new oak. You can decant it now for several hours and enjoy with a dramatically charred steak, but it will develop beautifully through 2011, at least..
